poster: IM A ID A IR A
title: Player ruining 60 ranked games by queuing up with a bot
body:
Hello everybody,

I apologize in advance for my bad english, it's not my native language.

Some days ago a player from the EUNE-server posted a screenshot from a player who was intentional feeding several games in a row without punishment. After some research we found out that this was a bot. However, there was a guy being premade with this bot. He intentionally queued with 2 accounts one being a bot and one played by himself so he can play solo botlane (at least that's what it looked like he wanted to do) while the bot repeatedly ran down mid.

After 21 games of intentional feeding and using a 3rd party program the first account got banned. 

https://picload.org/image/raparoow/account1.png

He instantly started using a second account which got banned after 19 games.

https://picload.org/image/raparolr/account2.png

And the 3rd one followed instantly as well.

https://picload.org/image/raparola/account3.png

The 3rd account stopped at 20 games, i assume it got banned and he has no accounts left as he currently plays without a bot. (yay, reformed!)

The account he played himself is untouched although everyone knows that he is queuing up with a bot and ruined at least 60 RANKED games like this.

https://picload.org/image/raparoll/mainaccount.png

How can this happen that a player can intentional feed AVERAGE 20 games in a row using a 3rd party program until he gets punished. Why does no one step in and stop this player (His names are well known, wasn't hard to find out) even tho the case got published at the boards and someone sent a ticket to the Riot support?

I really hope someone from Riot can give a decent explanation here, no Rioter from EU had the spine to even say one word to this.

with best regards and a happy new year to everyone

IM A ID A IR A


Edit: here the link the the discussion on the EU board:
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour-en/TsNGYuYJ-riot

replies.body: The real question I have. How the fuck did they win those 2 games. Like seriously. How do you carry that shit?

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/9b3b8c04eb153ea5cd109cd94befba7b.png

You can always carry harder.
What the fuck....
Git gud and carry harder.
Or the enemy team surrendered out of pity
Plot twist: The enemy team had two bots.
no joke this has happened to me on twisted treeline lol
This happens to everyone when they start TT
I wouldn't know. Over here in EUNE it's basically unheard of.
so many times.

That game was actually a 2v5 where the Rammus was dicking around.

Nothing was carried.
http://media.giphy.com/media/6OPbJtEDdy824/giphy.gif

The joke
Your head
Nah, I just hate how that little meme is spammed to be honest.

There's a lot of things people hate. Sometimes you just have to let the little ones go. This is a little one. I dislike most memes after about 2-3 days, but I'm not going to mess with people who enjoy it.

Yes, normally. But you see, the League community has turned into this "must carry" mentality. It's the reason people continue to all in the enemy after getting behind. Because they feel like they must carry the game. And things like this only further than mentality.

Happens in the other MOBAs, too. Kinda goes along with the territory, unfortunately. I wish people played a bit more thoughtfully and with less of a "must carry" mentality, but unless there's some huge change that takes place in the whole of the playerbase, I don't think criticizing that Rammus meme is really going to help anything. :\ 

It extends in other games, too, like FPS games where a good majority of the team will be running around with SMGs hoping to get the majority of the kills and try to sweep everyone on the objective points before the enemy can even react, despite the fact that even FPS games need you to spread out your weapon variety among your team to increase your possible approaches to an objective and response to an enemy defense.
they had one ore more afks
Godly teammates.

riot:i see he has fed for 60 games in a row,OH WAIT UP IN THAT GAME HE SAID REPORT XIN ZHAO
riot lyte:gotchu fam,permabanned for vebal abuse.
The riot classic

lmao.. that's kinda true :/

sad
It's really simple. Riot doesn't care. :)
Riot: Our automatic system detects intentional feeders after just A FEW games!
Our instant feedback system punishes players within 5 minutes so players are punished in real time !!!
i fail to see the problem

replies.poster: IM A ID A IR A
replies.body: So does the feeder buster
Props to the people that can carry an 0/15 adc in those 2 wins tho.
this is the very bottom of bronze 5.  the feeder is playing with the worst 2% of players in the world.  i bet half the players in  bronze 4 could carry him against people of that level.

Riot doesn't care about bots. Go play twisted treeline or ARAM on a sub-30 account. Human players are a minority in these queues because of all the bots being leveled and then sold to banned people or people like the one you showed. Riot is well aware and is most likely not doing anything because the game is dying/flat-lining and bots can be counted as players.

replies.poster: IM A ID A IR A
replies.body: Even if the accounts don't get banned for using 3rd party program, they should have been banned for intentional feeding way earlier than it happened.
I report it when I see it, but the majority of their opponents pre-30 are other bots that don't report them.

replies.poster: IM A ID A IR A
replies.body: Well, the above game are all ranked games ...

Those bots got to lvl 30 by being ignored by Riot, so you can probably assume they and their owner will be ignored until they trigger something automated like the int feeding catcher. Riot's probably grateful to the owner you posted for reducing queue times.

replies.poster: IM A ID A IR A
replies.body:
> Riot's probably grateful to the owner you posted for reducing queue times.

LMAO
Well this just confirms for me it is in fact almost impossible to get banned recently. Was suspecting this since I've been seeing such an increase in trolls and whatnot recently.

If I am reading the OP correctly the guy actually got 3 accounts banned he just didn't get the account that was queueing WITH the feeder accounts banned... yet.. hopefully someone at riot sees this and looks into it.

I can see why the automated system doesn't catch him though. Who would willingly queue with a bot designed to feed the other team? It really doesn't make any sense.

replies.poster: IM A ID A IR A
replies.body:
Yes, you understood it correctly. However, i think average 20 games intentional feeding in a row until the punishment comes is way too much, no matter if caused by a bot or by a player.

> hopefully someone at riot sees this and looks into it

I doubt it. This case has even found its way to Riot Support, but beside a copy paste answer nothing happened.
So now we know you can intent feed for 19 games in a row and be fine.

In my opinion I think that having a bot was worse than the feeding the enemy. After 4 deaths or so they are worth nothing, but lacking a 5th player is the worst part. Why I always prefer someone feeding and trying rather than feeding and already giving up.
**I demand an indefinite ban**
How many post do I need to make before I can get the option to post pictures on the forums?
uhh..you can put pictures on forums always?

Yup, just paste image link, and it usually converts them automatically.

http://wallpaper-gallery.net/images/pics-of-rain/pics-of-rain-11.jpg
LuL Riot letting int bots running loose

Wow, that guy needs permaban.

This is another consequence of the draconian system; Riot is so busy doing a witch hunt against harmless concepts such as "toxicity" but ignores legitimate problems in the game like afking, intentional feeding and bots.

Some people forget that carry the team used to mean that your team sucked. Now it seems to mean that you get carried all games.

Keep calm and carry harder.

That is pretty insane what that guy did to be honest. It's really sad how low some of these people get when trying to bypass the system. I commend you for collecting data and sharing it with the community.

replies.poster: IM A ID A IR A
replies.body:
I will do that. He is right now done with his 4th account making it overall 79 games. Seems like he has to get a new account before he continues because atm. he playes normally. I think i will open a new thread when he keeps going.

Edit: i just noticed his 4th account is not banned yet, but he doesn't use it for his needs atm. Someone plays normals on it.

I can't believe he would do that without getting a better bot program. Like all he needs is a Janna to shield him and he's golden, but he got this crappy program and lost big, what was the point of that? Was it just trolling? Cause it looks like trolling.
